website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for golfers so it's not the ideal choice for hunting, but good for those hoping to improve their game.
pros: A solid golf range finder by a top name in the industry
Offers 5X magnification for long range – up to 1,000 yards
cons: A few rare reports of malfunctions
Not the best choice for hunting purposes

website_summaries.verdict: Small form factor is easy to carry on the course. JOLT technology gives you a vibration when it's locked in.
pros: Extremely accurate when used on relatively flat terrain
Vibrations let you know you've locked a target
cons: Limited improvements over older Bushnell models

customer_reviews.title: Good device with bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I played approximately 60 rounds with this device, over the past 16is months. I also took great care of it, keeping it in its case between use. However it recently stopped working and a new battery didn’t help, nor did any troubleshooting techniques. I contacted Bushnell for options on warranty or repair and they have not responded. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Review a 2 Star vs 4
customer_reviews.text: Previously gave this a 5 star review however must add a followup 2 star rating. The device having intermittent problem with displaying yardage and vibration. Did not expect a $275 device to have trouble after 9 months. Furthermore, support from Bushnell is lacking. Website instructs how to return but does not offer free shipping, even if device is only 9 months old. Called Buishnell twice for these issues and put onhold for 10-15 minutes each time. Emailed and there was NO response. I purchased other yardage devices (not rangefinders) from Golf Buddy and they are excellent on supporting their products, even AFTER the warranty. Very disappointed. Recommend checking support/repair on rangefinders prior to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: MYS

customer_reviews.title: Nice but No Slope
customer_reviews.text: Nice and lightweight but does not have SLOPE technology. Don’t be fooled by the description and product info.
customer_reviews.author: CamperMN

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to plan shot strategy
customer_reviews.text: While you might think these are mostly to find range to the pin, I found the greatest benefit when playing different golf courses with obstacles along the fairway. How far to the front or back of that sand trap or water, how far to that tree, etc. Also on the practice mats you can see how far to various flags or items to gauge how far your various clubs carry with different swings. Tho only problem I've had is that it doesn't like fog - but if you think about it, that is inherent with laser technology.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to use and seems very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a couple months now with 15+ rounds. Really easy to use and seems very accurate. Haven't had any problems trying to shoot the flag or bunkers. The only difficulty I've had using it was behind trees with very thin brnaches and twigs sticking out. The range finder will pick up the very small twigs but that is to be expected. I really have no problems with it. The case strap did break on me and the netting inside is tearing. The case that it comes with isn't very sturdy. The range finder is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ta

customer_reviews.title: Great range finder, compact, the palpable "thrum" when it locks on a flag is a great feature
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my golfing wife and she love it. I have a Leupold myself and have to admit that I like this Bushnell more than my Leupold because it locks on quicker and gives the palpable "buzz" when it does lock on a flag. The "buzz" feature seems to drain battery a lot faster than my Leupold but it's still a nice feature. Excellent magnification, easy to read screen. My one "con" is that I wish the battery door were attached with a small tether - always afraid I'm going to drop it and lose it, otherwise, this range finder works great, is a reasonable size and is easy to carry on your belt.
customer_reviews.author: RolidnotTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: The best part is that he can even use it in ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this!! Its helped him with his golf game even!! The best part is that he can even use it in tournaments. The reason for 4 stars is because it didn't come with the silicone protector and I haven't been able to fine one for this model.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but better than the cheapies
customer_reviews.text: Definitely better than the crappy TecTecTec model I tried. You get what you pay for. Not overly impressed with the consistency of the readings - repetitions of the same measurement regularly vary by 3 yards which is far greater than the advertised one yard accuracy. The jolt feature seems to be a bit hit and miss as well. But at least it always picks up the flagstick regardless of the existence or type of reflector. And that's what really matters most.
customer_reviews.author: PedroD

customer_reviews.title: ... to replace my broken old one and it is great. The button is light to press down and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I tried to replace my broken old one and it is great. The button is light to press down and make my hand steady. It find the pin or flag easily. I love the vibration indicator that tell you the flag is found. I also like the elastic tie down on the poach which is much easier to use than the zipper. I also like the silicon protective cover. My search is ended.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTsai

customer_reviews.title: very fast
customer_reviews.text: Love this over my last laser range finder. I had the old one at least 10 years and was beginning to doubt it's accuracy and why doubts were confirmed when I bought this one. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is the buzz alert does not always activate even though the target flag seems to have been acquired and occasionally it cannot differentiate between trees behind the flag and the flag. These are minor complaints as they haven't affected my game yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Sher

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for this low quality device
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device for less than a year and it's not working. I sent it to Bushnell Lab for investigation within two weeks they sent me a letter saying, " the device has moisture in it and the cost to fix it is more than the cost of a new device." I called that BS, this device is made for outdoor. What you think is going to happen. Bushnell just want you to buy a new device and their 2 year warranty is a joke. I called and spoke with their customer service, she was very rule and wasn't helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Outhavong

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: i've been very happy with this rangefinder—i got it earlier this year and have been using it all spring and summer. i've found it to be really easy to use, quickly gets a reading, and accurate. the carabiner that it comes with is kinda small and wasn't large enough to hook onto my push cart, so i got a larger one from the dollar store and it's working out great. the blue silicon protective skin makes it easily grippable, so i don't have this fear that it will slip out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: chicago bear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Have and was using a GPS watch which works well for distance to the center of green. However not easy or convenient to get distances to fairway hazards or doglegs. This rangefinder is works very well. It is not difficult to hold steady and get a long distance readings. The Jolt feature is awesome as it confirms when it has sighted in on the flag stick as oppose to some stray object. I alway use this rangefinder for distances over my GPS watch now. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box. No need to wait for it to break.
customer_reviews.text: Defective right out of the box. Will not measure over 100 yrs. Bought it for a tournament. Rushed shipment. Needed it for tournament. I have had Bushnell in the past and been well pleased. This one is junk. (my experience)
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lasagna

customer_reviews.title: Died after about a year, but Bushnell replaced the product promptly
customer_reviews.text: I am a golf caddie. I do about 250 loops a year so this product gets a lot of use. After about a year of use the display got progressively dimmer and now will now work at all. I currently have a ticket open with Bushnell, hopefully they will repair the issue or send me a new unit. Edit: After returning my product to Bushnell, they replaced my item no questions asked. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Eccentricity

customer_reviews.title: Still getting used to using it, but it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to using it, but it's a little slow to focus and I sometime get different yardages. These problems may be more my fault than the Laser. If so I'll update this in time.
customer_reviews.author: webreecows

customer_reviews.title: The Mother of all golf range finders!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had all kinds of range finders over the years, but this is the mother of all Golf range finders! You simply can't get any better than this! I had a Boblov for 2 years, got it off Ebay for $80 brand new and it did well, but it couldn't track the flag through fog, so I used my dad's Bushnell Tour V4 Jolt, and instantly got the flag, and the jolt is so awesome! If you're going to get a range finder for golf, spend the extra and get this one! I promise it will be one of the best golf purchases you've ever gotten! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my to replace the tec tec brand that was always off on yardage. He loves them. Said they measure yardage perfect. Easy to use and quality construction.
customer_reviews.author: D. Roclevitch

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bushnell
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product but every once in a while it will not read the pin. Don't know why. I will point it to a tree and it will read it but then when I try to read the pin, nothing. Also, I wish the battery would blink or something when battery is low. It will show you that the battery is fine one day then just die.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Shelnut

customer_reviews.title: Bushnell doesn't backup their products
customer_reviews.text: The rangefinder worked ok for 1 1/2 years. Then the device that closes the battery compartment was broken and I could not close the compartment and thus use the battery, which makes the rangefinder absolutely useless. Sent it off to Bushnell, they said rangefinder was out of warranty, could not fix the device, and offered me $10 off a new Bushnell rangefinder, which usually costs around $300. Totally dissatisfied, a waste of money, will NEVER buy another Bushnell product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F McCain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rangefinder for Golf
customer_reviews.text: My former rangefinder was also a Bushnell but after 8 years of significant use needed to be replaced. The new rangefinder lives up to Bushnell's reputation for quality equipment. Easy to use, accurate for all golf yardage measurements, good-very good battery life, and a durable outer case material protects the contents. I would recommend this product for golf use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob and Diane

customer_reviews.title: Slope Function didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This was my third Bushnell golf rangefinder. Unfortunately, the slope function didn't work. They removed the separate button to control that function and apparently produced a buggy product. I returned it. BTW, my wife says it also is too small even for her. Makes it hard to focus.
customer_reviews.author: John N. Doggett

customer_reviews.title: Cut strokes dramatically!
customer_reviews.text: This rangefinder has helped my game immensely. Unlike my last cheapo rangefinder, this one is accurate and give me dead on yardage quickly. No fussing to lock in flag. Jolt technology insured lock in. My scores have improved, more GIR = under 80 scores.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W. Ward

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced my other rangefinder with this one. One of the problem I had with the other one was that it had difficult time seeking for pin when there was wooded background. This one has no problem with any backgrounds and it's quick & accurate. Great rangefinder!!!
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Jay

customer_reviews.title: B+
customer_reviews.text: for the average golfer trying to improve his/her game, a good range finder is a must have. this one is about as easy to use as any, though a little more expensive than the competitors. jolt feature adds some confidence but because each yardage returned can fluctuate 1-4 yards, I still find that I need to shoot a pin at least twice before choosing my club and what kind of swing to take. returns against layup landmarks are also fairly accurate&consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: It was the battery
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Bushnell Tour V4 Jolt Laser Rangefinder. I expected to pop it open, remove the battery protector and use for golf this morning. Nothing happened, no aiming circle, no low battery indicator, blank. Really hoping it is a dead battery, although the date on battery is 2023. I'll replace battery and update this, but why send with dead one if that's the case? Another day without. Update; it was a dead battery, great unit, fast and accurate
customer_reviews.author: Firemonkey

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Bushnell Tour V4 Jolt. Very accurate and easy to use. The only problem I have experienced is when we experience some fog in the morning. The unit does not pick up the flag and will not register a distance. Other then that its a great product.
customer_reviews.author: TommyD

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is Useless
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Bushnell V4 in February, by July it does not work so I send it in for repair under the warranty. Paid the $10 fee for repair and they send it back as water damaged and the only option is for me to purchase a new one. So Bushnell is the judge and jury, just refuse coverage. How do I send it to an independent company to dispute the assessment. Amazon, you are responsible too. They sell it as water resistant but not water proof. I purchased and used the protective case. Nice, charge me for sending it in but refuse warranty coverage, sorry Bushnell and Amazon, Good Bye.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate on range, rarely confirms with shake as designed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first point and confirm range finder. It works well, but rarely vibrates to confirm the distance as it states in instructions. It is accurate as I many times can confirm by partner scanning with theirs. Battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Scoop

customer_reviews.title: I don't believe any bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe any bad reviews. This is a great range finder. I like it so much that I came back 3 years later just to give it 5 stars. I'm still on the origional battery after easily 100 rounds worth of use! It is spot on and the maximum range ptetty much only depends on how steady you are.
customer_reviews.author: debkat10

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I tried all of the less expensive alternatives prior to ordering the Bushnell. GPS based applications and gadgets don't seem to be as accurate and aren't always reliable. Playing courses with poor data coverage bit me a couple of times when I couldn't obtain yardage. The bushnell has adjustable focus on the lens and allows you to determine distance to other markers along the hole which you can't do with other yardage indicators. Thanks for the quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Klingemann

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Lost my old Bushnell rangefinder which I had used for 4 or more years. Looked at other brands, some good reviews and less money, but decided to go with the product I knew.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: This works nice and I like the vibration feedback when it locks ...
customer_reviews.text: Replace a very old unit from bushnell that got flooded and thus destroyed. This works nice and I like the vibration feedback when it locks on the pin. Not as heavy as the older unit so hoping it can last as long as my previous one that was at least 10 years old
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Pope

customer_reviews.title: Terrific and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old callaway laser, this by far is easier and more accurate. Comes with a protective case and silicone cover, everything you need! I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I are avid golfers. After our last one was stolen :( I figured we needed an upgrade! This one is very accurate and using it is a breeze! The package arrived just like it was advertised on Amazon. It's a great price considering this specific range finder is sold at a much steeper price everywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Item was sent as open box item. Did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was sent as open box item. Did not include all parts and already had battery installed. Called Bushnell and they stated the item is known as REFURBISHED and would not be included with 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Korey Willi

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review after owning for several weeks. Used on about 6 rounds of golf. It really struggles to pick a pin up outside of 150 yards. And it hardly ever does the “vibrate” and “lock on” to the pin, it just hits the pin as any other object and sometimes I’m not sure if it’s the pin or trees right behind. Pretty disappointed, bushnell is usually really good
customer_reviews.author: Adam Balun

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works great sometimes picks up trees behind green or a branch in line with flag to be expected I guess but it does jolt when picking flag repeats within 2 yards when you click multiple times . Great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Bkb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Like the rubber sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Used for 4-6 weeks. Very nice. Like the rubber sleeve. Case is nice. Easy to use for an old guy!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy Fonner

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn’t have to smack it to get a reading.
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and after a month, I repeatedly, with another new battery, have to tap it on my hand to get it to register and give me the distance
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mullennix

customer_reviews.title: Just what you expect from it: accurate, fast, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got first the TecTecTec one (top of the model), since it had the same price as this one, and many features more than Bushnell V4 (like slope, waterproof, distance between obstacles, etc). But the main thing (measuring distance to flag) was not fast/easy, so I tried Bushnell. I prefer to drop all other functionalities and have this one that works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Matias F

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope/Right On
customer_reviews.text: Returned a watch rangefinder and bought this scope instead. Works great. Has a problem locating the target from the background.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Kaiser Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. I have tried other means of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I have tried other means of yardage measuring but I much prefer this unit. Imporves my game by know the actual yardage to the pin. Beats just knowing the front middle and back and guess where the pin actually is.
customer_reviews.author: BSM

customer_reviews.title: Great golf rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for the Tour V4 stolen by someone in the cart barn at Cummings Cove Country Club in Brevard NC. Love the smaller size. Have used it now for a couple of months and am happy with the new model.
customer_reviews.author: David J Pruiett

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have only used for one round. Matches both of my playing partner’s devices within a yard. It is easy to use even w shaky hands.
customer_reviews.author: sidehill

customer_reviews.title: Bushnell or nothing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this but decided it was worth the money to upgrade to the slope edition v4. Haven't had a second thought. Bushnell is by far the best lazer range finder on the market.
customer_reviews.author: rmack

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets (no SLOPE)
customer_reviews.text: This version doesn’t show *SLOPE*. Accidentally purchased this version when what I was really looking for was the Tour V4 ‘shift’. I’ve used a lot of range finders, and after using this one for one round it is without a doubt the easiest and most user friendly I’ve ever used. The JOLT is awesome and the lock on is quick. Will be returning for the ‘shift’, but this thing is sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C.

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a range finder for golf and am extremely happy with this one. I've used this at least three times a week since I purchased it an the battery is still at full charge.
customer_reviews.author: ffinch66

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Bonus to me is close up viewing with binocular . You can look to see if you made it to the green. Those with not so good eyesight can appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JOLT technology and ease of shooting target make this an easy device to use
customer_reviews.text: Finally jumped from SkyCaddie to rangefinder; JOLT technology and ease of shooting target make this an easy device to use. Has really simplified things on the course for me. One of those things that you ask yourself why I didn't do this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: T.C. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Just love it!
customer_reviews.text: This rangefinder is the real deal. Accurate and super quick to lock onto the flag.
customer_reviews.author: eagle

customer_reviews.title: An outstanding investment
customer_reviews.text: this range finder is well worth the money. I don't have the steadiest of hands when taking a read but this unit picks up a target immediately and I love the "jolt" when spot on!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Stender

customer_reviews.title: Light, Simple and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Love it, its so light, small, easy to carry. Simple to operate and accurate laser beam. Now I only have myself to blame if I can not hit the green.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick & accurate
customer_reviews.text: Point, click - feel the vibration and there it is -accurate range. Fastest range finder I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Krulis

customer_reviews.title: Best investment since purchasing my AP2s
customer_reviews.text: Found it to be a great, high-quality range finder. Use it all the time and never had issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen Park

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: I have now played 2 rounds with this rangefinder and I am already getting much better at dialing in the distance on my clubs. I recently moved from Denver to sea level and there is a big difference in club distance! It is also helpful on the range to shoot different targets. This will also speed up your play having confidence in your yardages.
customer_reviews.author: Micah N

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used and it only said very good and when I opened it was even better then I thought it would of came looks brand new. For the price and quality I would definitely buy again or tell someone too.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Polomski

customer_reviews.title: Great visual
customer_reviews.text: Easy to acquire the target. Although multiple readings may differ by a yard or two, but not an issue given my accuracy!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a Nikon when you can buy a Bushnell
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with a Bushnell. I got this for a great price and would recommend this to any golf of any level.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Compact Rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. It’s a significant investment, but if you want accurate distances, this tool will give you exactly that. I like the jolt technology that provides a vibration to let you know that you’ve measured to the flag stick (or something about the shape of a flag stick). This unit is very compact and lightweight. I opted for this model, which does not have slope, because I like to factor slope into distance based on my own experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great. The small details are really well thought out, like the clip that attaches to your bag and the band that you use to quickly close it while you’re playing.
customer_reviews.author: Rosco Snappy

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The laser wouldn't work after a few months even after replacing the batteries
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Great range finder
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and to hold steady. Can quickly find distance and like that it confirms when you are on the flag. Small in size so easily fits in hand
customer_reviews.author: Jujo

customer_reviews.title: Great range finder
customer_reviews.text: Great range finder , bought a TecTec the eyepiece and front scope rim came off after a week very hard to use , company said they would replace it never did Buy a Bushnell no comparison 100% better to the cheap ones
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Collins

customer_reviews.title: Buy new, not refurb from RockBottom
customer_reviews.text: Defective refurb product. Never worked. Will never buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Fourmaples

customer_reviews.title: i wear glasses and am easily able to see the yard's in the
customer_reviews.text: works just as it should, i wear glasses and am easily able to see the yard's in the viewer
customer_reviews.author: Charles R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but keep your v3 if you have one
customer_reviews.text: I liked my previous Jolt better. This one doesn't lock on the flag as well or give as consistent of yardages. Seems like my v3 was +/-1yd where the v4 is +/-2 or more.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J Cox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a must have for every golfer.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and easy to use. The jolt doesn’t always work tho when it locks onto the pin. Overall I’m happy with it for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Gillenwater

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely your #1 choice!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest range finder I've ever used. Locks in on the target within a second in a half. Locks in on targets easily from 4 to 5 hundred yards. Not sure about battery life as I have only used it about 8 rounds but it's still showing full battery. Highly recommend this as the best rangefinder I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because of how expensive it was. But let me tell you it is well worth the price. It is so much for accurate and easier to use then cheaper options. By far, best purchase I have ever made. Makes golf a bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: Carter D

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and easy to use. Use this rangefinder to have an advantage over other players. Or charge them a small fee ($20) to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great range finder .
customer_reviews.text: works great and its very light weight is a major plus
customer_reviews.author: senior citizen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Better than others I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected. I've tried other brands and had problems getting locked on to the pin. This works great. I don't have to brace myself against the cart to get a long reading. I even had a playing partner with an older model Bushbell that couldn't get a yardage. He asked me to check with mine... Bingo!
customer_reviews.author: scmoss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, best price.
customer_reviews.text: Use this 5 times a week along with my wife using 4 times a week. Love the feel / size. The price beat every store in my local area.
customer_reviews.author: matt simons

customer_reviews.title: Product fine but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed with seller. Product came as if it was “off the shelf”and not new as advertised. I would have rather paid full at a golf retailer if I knew this would have come like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use quickly and accurately
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed as it does not work as well as my old 1500 Pinseeker when the flagstick is over 140 yards away (sometimes it simply refuses to give yardages) or when there are other items such as trees behind the flagstick. Takes too long and too many attempts even if it does finally work.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Super fast and extremely accurate
customer_reviews.text: Super fast and extremely accurate. Occasionally gets trees if they're just behind green, but if you pan over the flag, then it gets the flag. Fantastic product. Hopefully it lasts for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick and accurate reading.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you plan to qualify for the tour, I wouldn't spend any more than this. Gives a quick reading.
customer_reviews.author: RES

customer_reviews.title: Good for flat courses
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work....sent it back and got the slope version....
customer_reviews.author: Charles Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Value, accuracy, dependability and build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for over a year, and over a hundred rounds—never failed me once. This is the one you want and need..FYI I’m a 5 HC and have used this in Europe and Canada as well as weekly use in US.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stankiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Helped to improve his game.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my husband. He used it today and loved it. It helped to improve his game. I didn't get any other details. Wait I was just told it speeds the game up.
customer_reviews.author: T. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great Range Finder
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Extremely accurate. Comes with a very nice protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Acura

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use but gets great results.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy. Very lightweight and easy to hit the target of the flag. The vibration when it grabs the flag is a great feature to let you know your not just hitting items past the flag.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in my hand and quick lock on target
customer_reviews.text: Great product as always. Tried a less expensive make but had to come back to Bushnell. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Cafe104

customer_reviews.title: Great rangefinder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rangefinder! It is super easy to use and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but sun hitting the optics causes burn in spots. Poor design but the unit works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Seewald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works as advertised. It's permanently in my golf bag now.
customer_reviews.author: archman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Rangefinder is excellent, only downside is it looks like it was used or an open box. No manuals and no cellophane wrapper.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Keep an extra battery in your golf bag since the included battery will eventually fail.
customer_reviews.text: This laser rangefinder is very accurate and easy to use. Every part of it is high quality. I can highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Had another brand at first they quit working on me returned it while this one is been fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need a steady hand.
customer_reviews.text: The problem is getting the site to rest steadily on the flag. It's better if I am following a foursome that has someone who is 65 and 300 pounds holding the flag.
customer_reviews.author: James L Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, accurate, good battery life. Definitely an upgrade over the v3 I had. I use this in conjunction with the Bushnell Phantom instead of using the 2 in 1 offering from bushnell. Highly recommend. The most important tool in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Just got this rangefinder and its awesome! If you're looking for a upgrade this is it.
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great asset on the golf courses. My friends seek me out because of my range finder specifics.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Range Finder
customer_reviews.text: Acquires the pin better than any range finder I’ve had. Also great price
customer_reviews.author: M J Evans

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this device! Accurate and has helped my golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Bachuzewski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my third golf laser and it's the best. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LeanderTX

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to use and very accurate. Accurate, ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use and very accurate. Accurate, unless you have a maintenance shed or shiny object behind the pin/flag. CR-2 batteries are a bit hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several of these range finders n went for the cheaper model, was a mistake so I returned it and bought this, great product for the avid golfer
customer_reviews.author: ely mattern

customer_reviews.title: rangefiner
customer_reviews.text: light, extremely easy to lock on target, very accurate, fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ellison

product_meta.title: Bushnell Tour V4 JOLT Golf Laser Rangefinder
product_meta.description: Bushnell golf brings you the next evolution of pin seeker with jolt technology in the Tour V4. This laser rangefinder packs an unbelievable feature set into a smaller, more ergonomically sound form factor. The Tour V4 has the pin seeker with jolt technology you love and delivers the unrivaled accuracy you come to expect from Bushnell in a smaller and faster package. Bushnell jolt technology provides you with short vibrating bursts to reinforce the laser is locked onto the flag. The Tour V4 is legal for tournament play and provides ranges from 5 to 1,000 yards with one yard accuracy. It provides yardages to flags from as far as 400 yards out. The Tour V4 is perfect for golfers of all abilities. A carry case and battery are included. Comes with a two-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Patriot pack includes protective skin, CR2 battery and carry case
Field of view 368 feet at 1000 yards; Ranging accuracy accurate to 1 yard
Coatings multi coated. Extra long eye relief 21 millilitre
Class 1 laser with less than 0.5 mW average power output
